name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (Nat)
description:
◈▬◈▬▬▣▬▬◈-▣-◈▬▬▣▬▬◈▬◈

An adventurer stumbles upon a long-forgotten temple in the jungle. Upon entering the temple, the adventurer activates a booby-trap causing the entrance’s door to begin slowly closing. You, the player, gets to decide just how deep into the temple you want to explore and collect as many coins as you can before the timer runs out and you get trapped inside!

You can escape the temple whenever you want! (Well... as long as you can remember the way out!)

How much treasure can you collect?

◈▬◈▬▬▣▬▬◈-▣-◈▬▬▣▬▬◈▬◈

Controls:

A and D for movement

W or SPACE for jumping

E to enter doors

◈▬◈▬▬▣▬▬◈-▣-◈▬▬▣▬▬◈▬◈

Assets:

Adventure Sprites by Elthen

Temple Tileset by surt

Objects by Sharm, surt, and vk

Hearts, Background Music, and Sound Effects were created by me

◈▬◈▬▬▣▬▬◈-▣-◈▬▬▣▬▬◈▬◈
